Title: Li Hongzhi uses "Falungong" to defraud money
Designer: Zhang Hongwei (张宏伟)Kong Simeng (孔思孟)
Publisher: Zhongyang minzu daxue chubanshe (中央民族大学出版社)
Notes: Fifth sheet of the series Privately encourage healthy practices, eradicate evil cults (私扬正气铲除邪教), published in 2001.The poster shows some of the properties, valuables, and goods that Li Hongzhi alledgedly obtained by fraud.
Theme: Privately encourage healthy practices, eradicate evil cultsFalun Gong
